availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William J. Moseley (McLean Co. Hotel Keeper)

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, Hotel keeper. Ohio County, Kentucky, native. Married Elizabeth Atherton Moseley. Father of John W. Moseley, Mary L. Moseley, Pressley T. Moseley, Aaron Moseley, Josephine Moseley, Susan M. Moseley, Sarah F. Moseley, and James R. Moseley. Hotel Keeper in McLean County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Unnamed District, p. 56. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. Find A Grave, "William Jasper Moseley (1818-1863)," Memorial #22694766, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22694766 (accessed September 19, 2017).
